com.dhemery.network

Class PublishingResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dhemery.network.PublishingResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource

    public class PublishingResource
extends Object
implements Resource
    Wraps a resource and publishes events about its communications.
    • Before each call to get(), the wrapper publishes a WillSendGet event.
    • After each call to get(), the wrapper publishes a GetResponded event.
    • Before each call to put(String), the wrapper publishes a WillSendPut event.
    • After each call to put(String), the wrapper publishes a PutResponded event.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PublishingResource(Publisher publisher, Resource resource)
      Create a wrapper that uses the given publisher to publish events about the given resource.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String get()
      Retrieve the content of the resource.
      String put(String message)
      Send a message to the resource and return its response.
      URL url()
      The URL through which this resource can be accessed.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
